CustomField.description: System automatically saving survey participants responses on next/prev/submit navigation button clicks. In addition, to enable system automatically save responses every <n> seconds, specify <n> value here.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: System automatically saving survey participants responses on next/prev/submit navigation button clicks. In addition, to enable system automatically save responses every <n> seconds, specify <n> value here.
CustomField.label: Automatically Save Responses in Seconds
